mapper.insert: insert into bookings (exhbn_title, exhbn_date, exhbn_location, exhbn_price, book_id, book_name, book_email, book_pnumber) values (#{exhbnTitle}, #{exhbnDate}, #{exhbnLocation}, #{exhbnPrice}, #{bookId}, #{bookName}, #{bookEmail}, #{bookPnumber})
mapper.select: select book_num bookNum, exhbn_title exhbnTitle, exhbn_date exhbnDate, exhbn_location exhbnLocation, exhbn_price exhbnPrice, book_name bookName from bookings

select book_num bookNum, exhbn_title exhbnTitle, exhbn_date exhbnDate, exhbn_location exhbnLocation, exhbn_price exhbnPrice, book_id bookId, book_name bookName, book_email bookEmail, book_pnumber bookPnumber from bookings where book_num like #{bookNum}
